title: How to buy refurbished electronics in india - Quora

response.answer_text: There are various online portals where you can buy refurbished electronics in India. One such website is Overcart- Buy Unboxed & Refurbished Mobiles, Cameras and more online at low prices. It's a growing e-commerce store which deals in refurbished, unboxed, excess stock and preowned electronics. You should check out the site once. They have CoD options, warranty on all their products and free shipping for orders above Rs. 499.
